I've started compiling a commentary section on the incarnations of the 
Shinsengumi in movies and whatnot for the website (some of it is 
up--link at end of message)

So far it's just pictures and my personal take on how the characters are 
their good points/flaws etc and if anyone has any comments to add please 
send them to me here or offlist at bsher213@...
http://www.shinsengumihq.com/pop.htm
